content: the finished piece is approximately 10 long 9 ½ tall and 5 ½ wide when made with the recommended tools and materials **tools** * size g/4 25mm hook * tapestry/darning needle **materials** * heavy worsted weight yarn * polyfil * safety eyes 9mm or 12mm **pattern notes** * all parts of this pattern are worked with the size g/4 25mm hook * all parts of this pattern are worked using the yarn-over technique and in continuous rounds unless otherwise stated * stitches are described using us terminology/notation
